00113 template <typename T, const unsigned int D, typename S = k_vector<vector_distance<T>, vector_distance<T> > >
00114 class kd_tree {
00115 public:
00117   typedef feature_vector<T, D> kd_point;
00118 
00120   typedef vector_distance<T> kd_neighbour;
00121 
00122   // Constructors and destructors.
00123   kd_tree(); 
00124   ~kd_tree(); 
00125 
00126   // Basic kd-tree operations.
00127   bool build(const kd_point *points, unsigned int num_points, unsigned int bucket_size = 32); 
00128   void knn(const kd_point &p, unsigned int K, std::vector<kd_neighbour> &output, T epsilon = (T) 0, bool ignore_p_in_tree = false) const; 
00129   void all_in_range(const kd_point &p, T distance, std::vector<kd_neighbour> &output, bool ignore_p_in_tree = false) const; 
00130 
00131   // Subscript operator for accesing stored data (will fail on non-built kd-trees).
00132   const kd_point & operator [] (unsigned int index) const;
00133 
00134   // Stream operators.
00135   template <typename T_, const unsigned int D_, typename S_>
00136   friend std::istream & operator >> (std::istream &in, kd_tree<T_, D_, S_> &kdtree); 
00137 
00138   template <typename T_, const unsigned int D_, typename S_>
00139   friend std::ostream & operator << (std::ostream &out, const kd_tree<T_, D_, S_> &kdtree); 
00140 
00141   // Kd-tree properties.
00142   unsigned int get_D() const { return D; } 
00143   unsigned int get_N() const { return num_elements; } 
00144 
00145 #ifdef DEBUG_KDTREE
00146   bool verify() const;
00147 #endif

00151   struct kd_search_data {
00152 
00153     const kd_point &p; 
00154     const kd_point *data;

00169   };

00172   struct kd_leaf {
00173     unsigned int first_index; 
00174     unsigned int num_elements; 
00175

00178       first_index(first_index), num_elements(num_elements) {}

00195   bool verify_more_than(const kd_point* data, float value, int axis) const;
00196 #endif
00197   };

00200   struct kd_node {
00201 
00202     union {
00203       kd_node *left_branch; 
00204       kd_leaf *left_leaf; 
00205     };
00206 
00207     union {
00208       kd_node *right_branch; 
00209       kd_leaf *right_leaf; 
00210     };
00211 
00212     T split_value; 
00213 
00214     // The leaf flags use the two uppermost bits of the axis index. Won't handle more than 2^30 dimensions.
00215     union {
00216       unsigned int axis; 
00217       unsigned int is_leaf; 
00218     };
00219 
00220     // Bit masks to access the leaf and axis information.
00221     static const unsigned int left_bit  = 0x80000000U; 
00222     static const unsigned int right_bit = 0x40000000U; 
00223     static const unsigned int axis_mask = 0x3FFFFFFFU; 
00224 
00225     // Constructors and destructor.
00226     kd_node() : left_branch(NULL), right_branch(NULL), is_leaf(0) {} 
00227     kd_node(std::istream &input); 
00228     ~kd_node(); 
00229 
00230 #ifdef DEBUG_KDTREE
00231   bool verify(const kd_point* data, int axis) const;
00232   bool verify_less_than(const kd_point* data, float value, int axis) const;
00233   bool verify_more_than(const kd_point* data, float value, int axis) const;
00234 #endif
00235 
00237     struct kd_axis_comparer {
00238       const kd_point *data; 
00239       unsigned int axis; 
00240 
00242       bool operator () (const unsigned int &i1, const unsigned int &i2) const {
00243         return data[i1][axis] < data[i2][axis];
00244       }
00245     };
00246 
00247     // --- Training-related --- //
00248 
00250     static kd_node *build(const kd_point *data, unsigned int *index, unsigned int n,
00251         kd_node *parent, unsigned int bucket_size, unsigned int &processed);
00252 
00254     unsigned int split(unsigned int *index, unsigned int n, const kd_axis_comparer &comparer);
00255 
00256     // --- Search-related --- //
00257 
00259     template <typename C> void explore(const kd_node *parent, kd_search_data &data, C &candidates) const;
00260 
00262     template <typename C> void intersect(const kd_node *parent, kd_search_data &data, C &candidates) const;
00263 
00264     // --- IO-related --- //
00265 
00267     bool write_to_binary_stream(std::ostream &out);
00268   };
